subject: Track and Field
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Trevor Graham, the former track coach who trained Marion Jones, Tim Montgomery and other elite runners, was sentenced on Tuesday to one year of home confinement and five years of probation for making false statements to a federal agent in connection with the Balco investigation.
